ADVICE_10_BODYTEXT.message: Canviar de facció pot ser una bona idea quan tens problemes amb les autoritats locals.

ADVICE_11_BODYTEXT.message: Make sure you know the surface gravity of a planet before you even think of landing on it.

ADVICE_11_HEADLINE.description: A reference to the song 'The Harder They Come', by Jimmy Cliff
ADVICE_11_HEADLINE.message: The harder the g, the harder the fall

ADVICE_1_BODYTEXT.description: Point made is: the real illegal goods traders are fixed to each station, but police's fake illegal goods traders will be random every time.
ADVICE_1_BODYTEXT.message: As you return to a station, be wary of those alternative market places you do not recognize, and you will stay out of trouble with the law.

ADVICE_2_BODYTEXT.message: És més ràpid recòrrer molts trajectes petits que la seva suma.

ADVICE_2_HEADLINE.description: (A reference to the famous poem The Road Not Taken, by Robert Frost)

ADVICE_3_BODYTEXT.description: (it simply says, to have enough fuel to leave a place where there is no possibility to refuel)
ADVICE_3_BODYTEXT.message: Evita saltar a sistemes deshabitats si no tens els mitjans per sortir-ne.

ADVICE_3_HEADLINE.message: Evita quedar atrapat: planifica bé els teus salts

ADVICE_4_BODYTEXT.message: Tria el teu marc de referència. Especialment quan vulguis igualar la teva velocitat i rumb amb un objectiu mòbil.

ADVICE_6_BODYTEXT.message: Para molta atenció a les notícies, doncs la informació pot afectar als preus de mercat.

ADVICE_7_BODYTEXT.message: Les donacions poden millorar la teva posició social, però no tots els actes de caritat et faran guanyar reputació.

ADVICE_8_BODYTEXT.message: Quan viatgis cap a sistemes binaris assegura't de seleccionar l'estrella correcta.

ADVICE_9_BODYTEXT.message: Fes el manteniment dels teus motors regularment, però recorda: obtindràs allò que paguis.

RUMOUR_1_BODYTEXT.message: Someone in the Federal Navy told me that one day, one of their corvettes accidentally jumped to a Haber outpost system about 50ly out from Sol, called Rondel; almost causing open conflict. Not many people seem to know about the incident itself outside of the navy, but some say Rondel administration has been more aggressive towards visitors since, and freight pilots started avoiding the system.

TALE_1_BODYTEXT.message: No et perdis el preciós eclipsi de New Hope quan Hades bloqueja la llum d'Epsilon Eridani.

TALE_1_HEADLINE.message: "Jo he vist coses que vosaltres mai no creuríeu."
